pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, October 6, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Toronto, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will speak with the Mayor of Montréal, Valérie Plante.

Closed to media.

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister and Mrs. Grégoire Trudeau will attend the State Funeral of the Right Honourable John N. Turner where the Prime Minister will deliver an address.

St. Michael's Cathedral Basilica
65 Bond Street

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

Ottawa, Ontario

The Prime Minister will speak with the Leader of the Green Party of Canada, Annamie Paul.

Closed to media.
